tours.title: Weekend in Dubai
tours.short_description: Experience the glitz and glamour of Dubai with a perfect weekend escape

itinerary.title: Arrival & Check-in
itinerary.description: Arrive at Dubai International Airport. Meet and greet by our representative. Transfer to your hotel. Evening at leisure to explore nearby areas or rest.

itinerary.title: Dubai City Tour & Burj Khalifa
itinerary.description: Morning city tour covering Dubai Marina, Palm Jumeirah, and Burj Al Arab photo stop. Afternoon visit to Dubai Mall and Burj Khalifa observation deck (124th floor). Evening free for shopping or dining.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari Adventure
itinerary.description: Morning at leisure. Afternoon pickup for desert safari including dune bashing, camel ride, sandboarding, and traditional BBQ dinner with live entertainment under the stars.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out from hotel. Transfer to airport for your flight back to Lagos. Arrive home with unforgettable memories.

tours.visa_notes: UAE tourist visa required. We provide full support including documentation guidance and application processing. Processing time: 3-5 working days. Valid passport required (minimum 6 months validity).
tours.cancellation_terms: 50% deposit required to secure booking. Balance due 14 days before departure. Cancellations more than 30 days before departure: 50% refund. 15-30 days: 25% refund. Less than 15 days: non-refundable. Flight tickets are non-refundable once issued.
tours.whatsapp_prefill: Hi Ontour, I'm interested in the Weekend in Dubai package (4D/3N). Could you send me more details and available dates?

tours.title: Zanzibar Escape
tours.short_description: Pristine beaches, historic Stone Town, and turquoise waters await you

itinerary.title: Arrival & Beach Relaxation
itinerary.description: Arrive in Zanzibar. Transfer to your beachfront resort. Spend the afternoon relaxing on pristine white sand beaches. Welcome dinner at the resort.

itinerary.title: Stone Town Discovery
itinerary.description: Morning guided tour of UNESCO World Heritage Stone Town - explore narrow alleys, historic buildings, and vibrant markets. Visit House of Wonders and Old Fort. Afternoon return to resort for beach time.

itinerary.title: Spice Plantation & Local Culture
itinerary.description: Half-day spice tour visiting clove, vanilla, and cinnamon plantations. Learn about Zanzibar's spice trade history. Afternoon at leisure for swimming or optional water sports.

itinerary.title: Mnemba Island Snorkeling
itinerary.description: Full-day boat trip to Mnemba Atoll for world-class snorkeling among colorful coral reefs and tropical fish. Beachside lunch included. Return to resort for final evening.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Leisurely breakfast. Late check-out available. Transfer to airport for your flight back to Lagos.

tours.seasonality: Best time: June - October & December - February (dry season)
tours.visa_notes: Visa on arrival available for Nigerian passport holders (USD 50, payable in cash). Ensure passport validity of minimum 6 months.
tours.cancellation_terms: 50% deposit to secure. Balance due 21 days before travel. Cancellations 30+ days: 50% refund. 15-30 days: 25% refund. Less than 15 days: non-refundable.
tours.whatsapp_prefill: Hi Ontour, I'm interested in the Zanzibar Escape package (5D/4N). Please share available dates and pricing.

tours.title: Obudu Cattle Ranch Mountain Resort
tours.short_description: Nigeria's premier mountain resort with breathtaking views and cool climate

itinerary.title: Arrival & Cable Car Experience
itinerary.description: Arrive at Obudu Mountain Resort base. Take the scenic cable car ride (25 minutes) up to the resort at 1,576m altitude. Check in and enjoy the cool mountain breeze. Evening at leisure exploring the resort grounds.

itinerary.title: Nature Trails & Canopy Walk
itinerary.description: Morning guided hike through pristine forest trails spotting unique flora and fauna. Experience the thrilling canopy walkway suspended above the forest. Afternoon visit to scenic waterfalls. Evening bonfire (weather permitting).

itinerary.title: Leisure & Departure
itinerary.description: Early morning optional horse riding or ATV adventure (extra cost). Late breakfast and resort exploration. Check out and cable car descent. Depart for Calabar/onward journey.

tours.seasonality: Year-round destination. Dry season (November - March) recommended for clearer views.
tours.visa_notes: No visa required for Nigerian residents. Valid ID required.
tours.cancellation_terms: 50% deposit required. Full payment 7 days before travel. Cancellations 14+ days: 75% refund. 7-14 days: 50% refund. Less than 7 days: non-refundable.
